description:
Natsu, with his true Dragon Slayer`s powers unleashed, finally crushes the lacrima and Master Zero! The rest of the lacrima are destroyed by his partners, and Nirvana thunderously crashes to the ground! With their victory secured, the alliance picks themselves back up. But, someone has set up runes, trapping Natsu and the others! The identity of the person who imprisoned them is the Captain of the Reformed Magic Council`s 4th Enforcement and Detention Corps. What does he want, after appearing out of the blue?!
Source: crunchyroll
